oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Effect of Different Footbath Solutions on Hoof Health
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hemling, T.
Janowicz, P.
Blowey, R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: footbaths
digital dermatitis
herd health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study tested the efficacy of Double Action, an effective footbath alternative to formalin. Double Action (DA), a product free of heavy metals and aldehyde, was tested as a preventative of DD and heel erosion in a side by side comparisonto 5% formalin footbath solution in a commercial UK herd.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2007; 291
